trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Old Town
There were no other sightings in Old Town on or around June 12th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking down union st and look up and saw the craft stared at it forat least for afew minutes used building for a guide to see if was moving and it was not it blended with sky and clounds i watch it for a number of minutes look down for a second and it was gone.
Summary: it was blue bottom snowwhite top blended with clounds
